## DisplayContainer.add() method

Add a named child object, with optional display options.

**Signature:**

```typescript
add(name: string, object: GameObject | {
        (): GameObject;
    }, options?: IDisplayOptions): IDisplayChild;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the child, to be used later with <code>get(name)</code> |
|  object | [GameObject](./bge-core.gameobject.md) \| { (): [GameObject](./bge-core.gameobject.md)<!-- -->; } | Child object to add. |
|  options | [IDisplayOptions](./bge-core.idisplayoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional display options to position and style the object. |

**Returns:**

[IDisplayChild](./bge-core.idisplaychild.md)

Reference to an object containing the added child, along with its display options.
